about_the_game:
This is an early demo version of an Early Access game Cloudsea. The gameplay and the content are still in development, and as such does not represent the final quality of the product. The game will enter Early Access in few months.

Demo Limitations:

• World Size: 1/5 of world size

• Dungeons: just a few dungeons

• Ships: 1/6 playable ships

• Content: Content (quests, items, enemies, animations, ...) and game mechanics are still under development

• Co-Op: No split-screen co-op

• Controls: Limited support for GamePad/Steam Deck

• Other: Save games may not work after update

• Optimization: Game is not optimized and may run slowly on some hardware (including Steam Deck)

At present, the game contains only the essential content needed for gameplay. AI behavior is still basic, enemies aren’t very smart, characters can walk on nearly vertical surfaces, enemy airships may collide mid-air and then spin around, boarding enemy ships is still work-in-progress, gamepad support is limited, not happy with the terrain and so on.

We plan to update the demo regularly with new features as they are developed, along with enough content to ensure an enjoyable experience - even for players who aren’t interested in purchasing the full game.

We’d love to hear your feedback, so feel free to share your thoughts here or through the links below.

If you like the game you can wishlist it on Steam. You can get in touch with us through Steam Community page or Discord (links on the right side of the page).

short_description: Cloudsea is a small indie action-adventure RPG game set in the clouds of the world of Cloudsea. Explore the floating islands of Cloudsea in airships, solve quests, gather resources, craft items, trade, and fight in airship-to-airship and melee combat!
